title: Quercetin induces keratinocytes apoptosis via triple inhibition of Notch, PI3K/AKT signaling and Glut1 in the treatment of psoriasis.
abstract: Psoriasis is an immune-mediated inflammatory skin disorder marked by excessive keratinocyte proliferation and inflammatory cell infiltration. Quercetin has shown a range of biological activities, highlighting its potential as a therapeutic agent for psoriasis.
journal: Biochimica et biophysica acta. Molecular basis of disease
